# HTMX for Fiber
HTMX for Fiber is a lightway package that allows to create HTML and HTMX applications in pure Go.
HTMX for Fiber provides primitives to create HTMX applications in Go, including:
- HTMX middleware
- HTMX request and response helpers
- HTMX event handlers
- [DaisyUI](http://daisyui.com) components
- [Heroicons](https://heroicons.com/) components

[docs](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/katallaxie/fiber-htmx)

## HTMX for Fiber install notes
1. `go get github.com/katallaxie/fiber-htmx` will install the package.
